title: Which technology is here to stay without major changes? - Quora

response.answer_text: Blockchain. Regardless of how it’s used, this underlying technology will take over many sectors such as land registration, voting, banking, etcetera. The most popular use of blockchain right now is, of course, cryptocurrencies, starting with Bitcoin.
